00032 #ifndef TMRM_LIST_H
00033 #define TMRM_LIST_H
00034

00036 extern "C" {
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #include <stdlib.h>
00040 #include <libtmrm.h>
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * Define a structure for linked list elements.
00044  */
00045 typedef struct list_elmt_s {
00046     tmrm_object *data;
00047     struct list_elmt_s *next;
00048 } tmrm_list_elmt;
00049 
00050 typedef void (tmrm_list_free_handler(tmrm_object* object));
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * Define a structure for linked lists.
00054  */
00055 typedef struct tmrm_list_s {
00056     int size;
00057     /*int (*match)(const void *key1, const void *key2);*/
00058     tmrm_list_free_handler *free_handler;
00059     tmrm_list_elmt *head;
00060     tmrm_list_elmt *tail;
00061 } tmrm_list;
00062 
00063 
00064 /* Public Interface */
00065 /*@null@*/ tmrm_list* tmrm_list_new(/*@null@*/ tmrm_list_free_handler *free_handler);
00066 
00067 tmrm_list* /*@null@*/tmrm_list_clone(tmrm_list *l_src);
00068 
00069 void tmrm_list_free(/*@only@*/ tmrm_list *list);
00070 
00071 /* Do we need this?
00072 void tmrm_list_copy(tmrm_list *list, int deep_copy); */
00073 
00074 int tmrm_list_ins_next(tmrm_list *list, tmrm_list_elmt *element, const tmrm_object *data);
00075 
00076 int tmrm_list_rem_next(tmrm_list *list, tmrm_list_elmt *element, tmrm_object **data);
00077 
00078 #define tmrm_list_size(list) ((list)->size)
00079 
00080 #define tmrm_list_head(list) ((list)->head)
00081 
00082 #define tmrm_list_tail(list) ((list)->tail)
00083 
00084 #define tmrm_list_is_head(list, element) ((element) == (list)->head ? 1 : 0)
00085 
00086 #define tmrm_list_is_tail(element) ((element)->next == NULL ? 1 : 0)
00087 
00088 #define tmrm_list_data(element) ((element)->data)
00089 
00090 #define tmrm_list_next(element) ((element)->next)
00091 
00099 /*@null@*/ tmrm_list* tmrm_list_from_iterator(tmrm_iterator* it,
00100     void (*free_handler)(tmrm_object *data));
